rooms.description: Spacious living room with modern minimalist design, ample natural light and Vastu-compliant orientation.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room, with a minimalist aesthetic.
Functional kitchen designed in a minimalist style with modular cabinets and ample storage. Vastu principles ensure proper ventilation and light.
Two-car garage with efficient space utilization and easy access to the farmhouse.
Private gym area featuring state-of-the-art minimalist equipment, adequate ventilation and natural lighting in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned for auspicious entry as per Vastu guidelines.
Vehicle access to the garage, designed with security and ease of movement in mind.

common_spaces.description: Main corridor connecting all ground floor rooms ensuring seamless flow and adherence to minimalist design principles.
Entrance lobby designed for smooth transition between outdoor garden space and indoor living areas, with Vastu-compliant spatial orientation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with south-facing windows for optimum sunlight as recommended by Vastu. Includes an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.
Secondary bedroom with ample natural light, designed in a minimalist style following Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and space for extended family members, aligned with minimalist principles.
Compact yet functional bedroom designed to maximize space in a minimalist farmhouse setting.
Additional bedroom offering comfort and privacy for guests or family, following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed with safety and accessibility in mind, adhering to minimalist aesthetics.
Access to the roof garden which provides additional open space for relaxation or gardening activities.

common_spaces.description: Corridor connecting all bedrooms on the first floor, designed with minimalist lighting and Vastu compliant layout.
Small lobby area for convenience between the staircases and the common areas.

rooms.description: Multipurpose study/office space designed with a minimalist setup and equipped with modern technology, following Vastu guidelines for concentration.
Guest room offering comfort and privacy, designed to accommodate short-term stays in a minimalist style.

openings.description: Skylights providing natural light to the second floor areas, following Vastu principles for balanced energy distribution.
Staircase access ensuring safe exit in emergencies.

common_spaces.description: Corridor on the second floor for connecting study, guest room and other utility spaces.
